languages.text: {n}Техножрец затягивает инфразвуковую литанию, отчего у вас начинает посасывать под ложечкой, и приближается к когитатору. Плавным движением он кладет руки на приборную панель и начинает совершать священные манипуляции. Большая часть действий магоса вам непонятна: он перещелкивает тумблеры, ритуально постукивает по некоторым реле, а над другими совершает защитные знаки.{/n}

{n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец затягивает инфразвуковую литанию, отчего у вас начинает посасывать под ложечкой, и приближается к когитатору. Плавным движением он кладет руки на приборную панель и начинает совершать священные манипуляции. Большая часть действий магоса вам непонятна: он перещелкивает тумблеры, ритуально постукивает по некоторым реле, а над другими совершает защитные знаки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel a tiny bit nauseous and approaches to cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel with one smooth movement and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the magos' actions are unclear to you: he is flipping tumblers, ritually knocking on some relays and drawing protective symbols over the others.{/n}

{n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel a tiny bit nauseous and approaches to cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel with one smooth movement and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技术神甫用次声波念起了咒语，让你感觉有点恶心。他走近沉思者，将双手放在控制面板上，以流畅的动作进行着神圣的操作。他的绝大部分操作你完全看不懂是怎么回事。你看着他拨动开关，虔诚地敲击几个继电器，同时还在其他地方画着保护性的符号。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司用次声波念起了咒语，让你感觉有点恶心。他走近思考器，将双手放在控制面板上，以流畅的动作进行着神圣的操作。他的绝大部分操作你完全看不懂是怎么回事。你看着他拨动开关，虔诚地敲击几个继电器，同时还在其他地方画着保护性的符号。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote empieza a entonar una letanía infrasónica que te provoca leves náuseas antes de acercarse al cogitador. Coloca sus manos sobre el panel de control en un movimiento fluido y empieza las manipulaciones sagradas. La mayoría de las acciones del magos son un misterio para ti, así que te limitas a observar cómo cambia interruptores y toca ritualmente algunos de los relés mientras traza símbolos protectores sobre otros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote empieza a entonar una letanía infrasónica que te provoca leves náuseas antes de acercarse al cogitador. Coloca sus manos sobre el panel de control en un movimiento fluido y empieza las manipulaciones sagradas. La mayoría de las acciones del magos son un misterio para ti, así que te limitas a observar cómo cambia interruptores y toca ritualmente algunos de los relés mientras traza símbolos protectores sobre otros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は、少し気分が悪くなるほどの超低周波音で詠唱しながら、考算機に近づく。流れるようにコントロールパネルに手を置くと、神聖なる操作を実行し始めた。賢人のやることはほとんどチンプンカンプンで、彼がトグルスイッチを切り替え、儀式のようにリレーをいくつかタップしつつ、他のものの上に守りのシンボルを描くのを眺めていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester stimmt eine Infraschall-Litanei an, bei der dir leicht übel wird, und nähert sich dem Cogitator. Er legt seine Hände mit einer sanften Bewegung auf das Bedienfeld und beginnt mit heiligen Eingaben. Die meisten Aktionen des Magos sind für dich ein komplettes Mysterium, und du siehst zu, wie er Schalter umlegt und mehrere Relais rituell antippt, während er auf andere Schutzsymbole zeichnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

Er legt seine Hände mit einer sanften Bewegung auf das Bedienfeld und beginnt mit heiligen Eingaben. Die meisten Aktionen des Magos sind für dich ein komplettes Mysterium, und du siehst zu, wie er Schalter umlegt und mehrere Relais rituell antippt, während er auf andere Schutzsymbole zeichnet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre s'approche du cogitateur et entonne une litanie d'infrasons qui vous donne la nausée. D'un geste fluide, il place ses mains sur le panneau de contrôle et entame des manipulations sacrées. La plupart des actions du magos sont un mystère pour vous. Vous ne pouvez que le regarder actionner des interrupteurs et tapoter rituellement plusieurs relais tout en dessinant des symboles protecteurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

Vous ne pouvez que le regarder actionner des interrupteurs et tapoter rituellement plusieurs relais tout en dessinant des symboles protecteurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, sesötesi bir ilahi mırıldanarak kavramsayara yaklaşıyor. İlahinin başını döndürdüğünü hissediyorsun. Tek hamlede elini kontrol paneline yerleştirip kutsal güdümlemeye başlıyor. Magos'un eylemlerini idrak etmekte zorlanıyorsun. Açma kapama düğmeleriyle oynuyor, ayin gereği rölelerden bazılarına dokunup bazıları üzerinde eliyle koruyucu semboller çiziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest starts chanting an infrasound litany that makes you feel slightly nauseous and approaches the cogitator. He places his hands on the control panel in one smooth motion and starts performing sacred manipulations. Most of the Magos's actions are a total mystery to you, and you watch as he flips toggle switches and ritually taps several relays while drawing protective symbols over others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip, sesötesi bir ilahi mırıldanarak kavramsayara yaklaşıyor. İlahinin başını döndürdüğünü hissediyorsun. Tek hamlede elini kontrol paneline yerleştiriyor ve kutsal güdümlemeye başlıyor. Magos'un eylemlerini idrak etmekte zorlanıyorsun. Açma kapama düğmeleriyle uğraşıyor, rölelerden bazılarına dokunuyor ve koruyucu semboller çiziyor.{/n}
